name: Organization components for document your Design System. Improve your handoff.
description:
I collected and created different organizational components to document a Design System.

👀Take a look to the list of elements:


⬆️ Header:

  • Section
  • Subsection
  • Index
  • Label


📏 Specs:

  • Margin
  • Padding
  • Dimension
  • Pointer
  • Pointer note


🔄 Overflow:

  • Flow arrow
  • Status


🗒 Notes:

  • Examples
  • Sticky Notes
  • Notepad
  • Reference Tags


________________________________________________________


Template to show the spec of components like (properties, anatomy, behaviour and application).


I hope you like it! 🤗
